title: S510 Manage Public Relations | Yönerge
text: Künye Bilgisini Göster Units in Charge Owner: Marketing and Institutional Communication (PKİ) Responsibles: Suppliers Input: Supplier in Charge: Customers Output: Customer Served: Performance Indicators Reporting Period Instruction Letter Procedure Form Institutional Identity Instruction Letter (IMIC-S520-07) Req.
